summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons inmate housing record for Jeffrey Epstein, detailing his cell assignments and movements within the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York from July 6, 2019, to August 10, 2019. The document shows his final cell location and the date/time of his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the inmate housing record, showing his cell assignments and movements within the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

events.title: Epstein's initial housing assignment
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was initially housed in cell RO1-001L (House R, Range 01, Bed 001L) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Epstein's final cell assignment and death
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell (204-206LAD, House Z, Range 04, Bed 206L AD) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

keyFacts: This document is an official Bureau of Prisons record of Jeffrey Epstein's housing assignments at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The record shows Epstein was moved between multiple cells and housing units during his incarceration from July 6 to August 10, 2019.
Epstein's final recorded location was cell 204-206LAD (House Z, Range 04, Bed 206L AD) where he died on August 10, 2019.
The document provides precise timestamps for each cell transfer, creating a timeline of Epstein's movements within the facility.
